entry.title: bmaroti9/Overmorrow
entry.summary:
minimalist colorful weather app

Overmorrow weather

Beautiful minimalist weather app.

Weather providers ğŸŒ¨ï¸

  • open-meteo
  • weatherapi.com
  • rainvewer

Only now after working on Overmorrow for more than 6 months, have I realized that my app is defined as "non commercial" in open-meteo's documentation ğŸ˜‚. Which is great because i can use it completely for free ğŸ˜! So now i can add 14 days of forecast . Also its one of the most accurate weather providers.

I get my sunrise sunset times and air quality from weatherapi.com ğŸƒ. Also it is offered as a second weather provider, but it only has 3 days of weather data.

And all the radar images are from rainviewer's radar ğŸ’§.

Features ğŸ‰

  • accurate weather forecast
  • open source
  • no ads
  • no data collected
  • minimalist colorful design
  • detailed forecast
  • sunrise sunset times
  • air quality insights
  • full screen radar
  • 14 days of forecast
  • dynamically adapting color scheme
  • 5 color themes (original, colorful, monochrome, light, dark)
  • languages support

Why make Overmorrow? â“

I am 15 and i have been programing since the age of 7. I started small (Scratch and NetsBlox) went to Python... and then to Flutter. This is my first ever project that can actually be downloaded by anyone. So I hope you like it ğŸ˜‰!

I have always wanted to make a weather app ğŸŒ©ï¸. At first the concept was just to make an app that is free and ad free, but after diving into the whole thing i realized that i wouldn't be the first to do that. So instead here is my take on the weather app ui (but i did kep it free and ad free too ğŸ˜). I tried to go for a minimalist and organized interface.

Milestones & To-do âœ…

  • âœ… Add place searching
  • âœ… Add radar
  • âœ… Add air quality
  • âœ… Add translations
  • âœ… 14 day forecast
  • âœ… Settings/Info/Donate pages
  • âœ… Tablet mode
  • âœ… more than one weather provider

hope to add in the near-future:

  • âŒ Add widgets (I have been trying but it's just so complicated ğŸ˜‘)
  • âŒ Maybe add notifications
  • âŒ Maybe add to Iphone (right now Android only)
  • âŒ More weather providers

Anything I should add? let me know!

Support me! â¤ï¸

If you want to help, or just simply want to support me. this is my patreon: https://www.patreon.com/MarotiDevel. Thank you so much! â¤ï¸

also if you like this app please consider leaving it a star on github â­.
